DOC.brief_summary: Pituitary adenomas can cause compression of optic nerves and chiasm, which will lead to damage of vision. This study aims to evaluate the predictive factors for recovery of vision in patients with pituitary adenomas following trans-sphenoidal surgery.
DOC.brief_title: The Predictive Factors of Vision Recovery in Patients With Pituitary Tumor
DOC.criteria: >18 years old patients with pituitary adenomas, loss of visual field patients receive transsphenoidal surgery visual damage caused by other diseases
